extensionDescription.message: TYPO3 Review vereenvoudigt het reviewen van TYPO3 patches.

changeIdNotFound.description: Message shown in the popup if change id was not found
changeIdNotFound.message: No change id could be found. Please navigate to a valid issue.

loading.description: Message shown in the popup when loading details

reviewSiteUnavailable.description: Message shown in the popup when review site is unavailable
reviewSiteUnavailable.message: Unable to connect to http://local.typo3.org/review.php. Is your review box running? Head over to GitHub for installation instructions: https://github.com/Tuurlijk/TYPO3.Review.

certificateFailure.description: Message shown in the popup when certificate has not yet been accepted
certificateFailure.message: Failed to connect to the review API over https. Please navigate to http://local.typo3.org/review.php and accept the certificate.

apiVersionFetchFail.description: Message shown in the popup when fetching the api version failed
apiVersionFetchFail.message: Failed to fetch the review api version. Falling back to review.php script.

issueDetailLoadFail.description: Message shown in the popup when loading issue details failed

resetSitesFail.description: Message shown in the popup when review site reset failed
resetSitesFail.message: Failed to reset the review sites. Please login to the review box to investigate.

resetSitesSuccess.description: Message shown in the popup when review site was reset

updateSitesFail.description: Message shown in the popup when review site update failed
updateSitesFail.message: Failed to update review sites. Please login to the review box to investigate.

updateSitesSuccess.description: Message shown in the popup when review site was updated

cherryPickFaill.description: Message shown in the popup when cherry-pick was a failure
cherryPickFaill.message: Cherry-Pick failed. Please login to the review box to investigate.

cherryPickSuccess.description: Message shown in the popup when cherry-pick was successful

optionsMode.description: Show header information in [render mode] in the [screen position]

optionsCornerFor.description: Show header information in the [screen position] ___corner for___ [seconds] seconds.

optionsSeconds.description: Show header information in the [screen position] corner for [seconds] ___seconds___.

optionsSectionContentAboutHTTPSpy.description: Section of text describing TYPO3 Review
optionsSectionContentAboutHTTPSpy.message: TYPO3 Review maakt het mogelijk om de request en response headers te inspecteren direct nadat een pagina geladen is. De headers verschijnen in een venster bovenop de geladen pagina en verdwijnen naar een ingestelde tijd. Er is een normale weergave die alle header informatie toont en een micro weergave die alleen de opgegeven response headers toont.

optionsSectionContentAboutMe.message: Mijn naam is Michiel Roos. Ik vond het leuk om TYPO3 Review te ontwikkelen. Ik heb er een boel van geleerd. Ik hoop dat je hem nuttig vind en hem gebruikt met plezier. Als je suggesties of opbouwende kritiek hebt, neem dan contact met me op. Als je blij bent met TYPO3 Review, zou je dan een willekeurig bedrag willen doneren?

optionsSectionTitleWhatDoesItDo.description: Section title of What does it do?

optionsLabelHideRequestHeaders.description: Label for hide request headers input field

optionsLabelHideResponseHeaders.description: Label for hide response headers input field

optionsLabelShowResponseHeaders.description: Label for show response headers (in micro mode) input field

optionsLabelShowResults.description: Label for show results input field

popupDefaultMessage.description: The default message shown in the browserAction popup
